title: Lost & Found Management System
description: A database-driven system to efficiently manage lost and found items, track claims, and streamline operations.
features: Database design with 6 normalized tables (Item, Finder, Owner, Location, Staff, Claim)
Stored procedures for item retrieval and claim status updates
SQL queries for tracking item status and claims
Sample data for testing (finders, owners, locations, staff, items, claims)
